content.html: This is a reason of my projects are open source code that people run themselves: that way I can mostly avoid the risk of accidentally losing or leaking user data! Also why I've been taking the responsibility of launching my Datasette Cloud SaaS platform very seriously indeed
content.value:
This is a reason of my projects are open source code that people run themselves: that way I can mostly avoid the risk of accidentally losing or leaking user data!

Also why I've been taking the responsibility of launching my Datasette Cloud SaaS platform very seriously indeed
